text: Mba guma buni nzua vov, wom khaŋ nzuai, “Ndu buni thari khergip, Sardis ŋgu bakɨmen ki sios gari enser ndi mbarari. Mba buni khaŋ muuŋgi, ‘Gu Fhe Bakɨmen harathɨgi ŋiniŋgi garav, gu vhɨra harathɨgi ŋkaa suigi. Gu kha buni ndi nde ndi mbai. Gu nde mbui tɨvi, gu za nta kaŋgi. Mbe nde nzuav khaŋ nzuai, “Kha sios, ana guigira thɨga havhargiap khar ki.” Fhuvara. Nde rimgi fara muuŋgiap ki.
